title: Mathematician

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, you can Observe at a player’s house. You learn their role, everyone who visits them, and what actions happen to them (like Spy).
- At night, you may multitask and submit to the host a list of every player's role. You are informed if you are correct or wrong. Only done once per night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You see past Frames.
- If the town hangs you, they all gain the ability to see past frames and can hang an additional player the next day.
- If an evil faction kills you, they appear Innocent from now on and get an additional factional anonymous vote (the town knows the evils get this vote).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4248
*It all makes sense to me! Only me! No one else in this world can comprehend what I know.*
